summary: Adds a teleport spell with multiple destinations.
descriptionHtml:
========================================================
-==CURRENT VERSION:==-
========================================================

The current version is v1.1c.



========================================================
-==DESCRIPTION==-
========================================================

This mod adds a new spell, Kyne's Gate, that allows near-instant transportation to a wide variety of locations. It was made mostly as a tool for myself to quickly progress through the game and test other mods.

The spell tome can be found on the front counter at the Riverwood Trader. See screenshot on the mod's page for further help.

After casting the spell and being transported to Kyne's Gate, you may activate one of several stones that will offer a list of destinations in that stone's category.

Cast the spell while at Kyne's Gate to return to your original location. Though it is listed under Conjuration, it does not affect your Conjuration skill.

There are 3 versions which may be downloaded seperately:
-Standard: Quest-locked locations are unavailable until you can access them on your own. Other locations are available from the start.
-Cheat: All locations are available from the start, including quest locations you shouldn't be able to access yet.
-Restricted: In addition to restricting access to quest locations, other locations are unavailable until you visit them.

Locations supported are as follows (CONTAINS LOCATION SPOILERS):

RESIDENCES:
-Heljarchen Hall (only if Hearthfire is loaded)
-Lakeview Manor (only if Hearthfire is loaded)
-Windstad Manor (only if Hearthfire is loaded)
-Breezehome
-Hjerim
-Honeyside
-Proudspire Manor
-Vlindrel Hall
-Severin Manor (only if Dragonborn is loaded)
-College of Winterhold, Archmages Quarters
-Dawnstar Sanctuary, Listener's Quarters
-Jorrvaskr, Harbinger's Quarters
-Nightingale Hall, Guildmaster's Quarters
-Castle Volkihar, Clan Leader's Quarters (only if Dawnguard is loaded)
-Fort Dawnguard, Lieutenant's Quarters (only if Dawnguard is loaded)

UNIQUE LOCATIONS:
-Bromjunaar Sanctuary
-Throat of the World
-Forgotten Vale, Balcony (only if Dawnguard is loaded)
-Blackreach
-Forgotten Vale, Paragon Portal (only if Dawnguard is loaded)
-Soul Cairn, Bone Yard
-Skuldafn
-Sovngarde, Hall of Valor

CITIES:
-Markarth
-Riften
-Solitude
-Whiterun
-Windhelm
-Dawnstar
-Falkreath
-Morthal
-Winterhold
-Raven Rock (only if Dragonborn is loaded)

SETTLEMENTS:
-Dragon Bridge
-Ivarstead
-Karthwasten
-Riverwood
-Rorikstead
-Shor's Stone
-Dushnikh Yal
-Largashbur
-Mor Khazgur
-Narzulbur
-Skaal Village (only if Dragonborn is loaded)
-Tel Mithryn (only if Dragonborn is loaded)
-Thirsk Mead Hall (only if Dragonborn is loaded)

HEADQUARTERS:
-College of Winterhold
-Dark Brotherhood Sanctuary
-Jorrvaskr
-Thieves Guild Headquarters
-Castle Dour
-Palace of the Kings
-High Hrothgar
-Sky Haven Temple
-Bard's College
-Castle Volkihar (only if Dawnguard is loaded)
-Fort Dawnguard (only if Dawnguard is loaded)

DAEDRIC SHRINES:
-Shrine of Azura
-Shrine of Boethiah
-Shrine of Clavicus Vile
-Shrine of Malacath
-Shrine of Mehrunes Dagon
-Shrine of Meridia
-Shrine of Peryite

STANDING STONES:
-Guardian Stones
-Apprentice Stone
-Atronach Stone
-Lady Stone
-Lord Stone
-Lover Stone
-Ritual Stone
-Serpent Stone
-Shadow Stone
-Steed Stone
-Tower Stone
-Beast Stone (only if Dragonborn is loaded)
-Earth Stone (only if Dragonborn is loaded)
-Sun Stone (only if Dragonborn is loaded)
-Tree Stone (only if Dragonborn is loaded)
-Water Stone (only if Dragonborn is loaded)
-Wind Stone (only if Dragonborn is loaded)

DRAGON LAIRS:
-Ancient's Ascent
-Autumnwatch Tower
-Bonestrewn Crest
-Dragontooth Crater
-Eldersblood Peak
-Lost Tongue Overlook
-Mount Anthor
-Northwind Summit
-Shearpoint
-Skyborn Altar
-Saering's Watch (only if Dragonborn is loaded)

MILITARY CAMPS:
-Eastmarch Imperial Camp
-Falkreath Imperial Camp
-Hjaalmarch Imperial Camp
-Pale Imperial Camp
-Reach Imperial Camp
-Rift Imperial Camp
-Whiterun Imperial Camp
-Winterhold Imperial Camp
-Falkreath Stormcloak Camp
-Haafingar Stormcloak Camp
-Hjaalmarch Stormcloak Camp
-Pale Stormcloak Camp
-Reach Stormcloak Camp
-Rift Stormcloak Camp
-Whiterun Stormcloak Camp
-Winterhold Stormcloak Camp



========================================================
-==TO-DO LIST==-
========================================================

Add support for modded locations.
Depending on how SKSE development goes, add your current custom map marker as a destination.
author: WTFus

files.name: Kynes Gate - Standard
files.changelogHtml: Fixed issues with Markarth and Atronach birthstone teleports.
